ej,hatcb001,C,buckc901,Checked swing $Orlando Hernandez, angry about Russ Johnson's double, threw a fastball inside to Randy Winn, who had to jump out of the way; many Devil Rays yelled at Hernandez from the bench; Hernandez stared at them until catcher Jorge Posada went to Hernandez and turned him away; Winn tried to check his swing on the 2-1 pitch, which was called a strike; Devils Rays 3B coach Billy Hatcher was ejected by 3B umpire CB Bucknor; Winn's at bat took about 10 minutes2000TBA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,posaj001,P,reedr901,Fighting with Bobby Smith ej,smitr003,P,reedr901,Fighting with Jorge Posada $after Bobby Smith struck out, catcher Jorge Posada stepped in front of the plate to throw the ball to 3B; Smith pushed Posada slightly; Posada shoved Smith and they started wrestling; they fell to the ground with Smith on top, flailing away with both hands at Posada; the benches cleared and the players were separated; both were ejected by HP umpire Rick Reed2000TBA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,rothl101,M,mcclt901,Demanding Pedro Martinez' ejection ej,willg001,P,cuzzp901,Charging mound after HBP $Gerald Williams charged mound, knocked down Pedro Martinez then was tackled by Jason Varitek; both benches cleared; Williams ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi; Devil Rays Manager Larry Rothschild ejected by 2B umpire Tim McClelland demanding that Martinez be ejected; this started a game-long beanball war which resulted in eight ejections; Martinez retired 24 consecutive batters after this HBP; Red Sox 1B Brian Daubach hurt his arm in the melee and was taken to the hospital for X-rays after the game2000TBA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$the Devil Rays thought that Brian Daubach took some cheap shots in the scrum after Pedro Martinez hit Gerald Williams in the first inning; thus, they targeted Daubach2000TBA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
